document_data.name: Jalavaerra Ishtra
document_data.nicknames:
The "Fine Gold Chain"
"Everyone's friend and every adventurers' mother"
document_data.mainbody: '''Jalavaerra Ishtra''' was a retired [[fighter]] and adventuress from [[Westgate]] who owned and managed the adventurers' club [[The Fine Gold Chain]] in [[Memnon]].
document_data.Description: Jalavaerra was tall and willowy and "famously beautiful", with long blonde hair and large, dark, purple eyes.
document_data.Personality: She was a crafty investor and was also adept at arranging business deals.
document_data.Rumors and Legends: Her club was named after her own nickname, which she received from an incident where she stole a mile-long chain from a [[dragon]]'s horde by wrapping it around her body.
document_data.Reference:
*
